mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prod_id AS "prodId", a.cat_id AS "catId", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateId.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_prod_cate( id, prod_id, cat_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{prodId}, #{catId}, #{status}, #{createId.id}, #{createTime}, #{uVersion}, #{updateId.id}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_prod_cate SET prod_id = #{prodId}, cat_id = #{catId}, create_time = #{createTime}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateId.id}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
